channel.title: KaTeX on NavyLink
channel.description: Recent content in KaTeX on NavyLink

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Using KaTeX Code Block 1```katex 2f(a,b,c) = (a^2+b^2+c^2)^3 3``` $$f(a,b,c) = (a^2+b^2+c^2)^3$$ Using KaTeX Shortcode 1{{< katex >}} 2f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi 3{{< /katex >}} $$ f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi $$ Further Reading KaTeX official site Hugo KaTeX module
